recipes.//: Options related to various recipes in the game.

craft_elite_basic_pots.//: Determines if elite basic botany pots may be crafted.

craft_elite_hopper_pots.//: Determines if elite hopper pots may be crafted.

craft_elite_wax_pots.//: Determines if elite wax pots may be crafted.

craft_ultra_basic_pots.//: Determines if ultra basic botany pots may be crafted.

craft_ultra_hopper_pots.//: Determines if ultra hopper pots may be crafted.

craft_ultra_wax_pots.//: Determines if ultra wax pots may be crafted.

craft_mega_basic_pots.//: Determines if mega basic botany pots may be crafted.

craft_mega_hopper_pots.//: Determines if mega hopper pots may be crafted.

craft_mega_wax_pots.//: Determines if mega wax pots may be crafted.
